alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 9:20PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Texas... Guadalupe River near Bloomington affecting Victoria, Refugio and Calhoun Counties. For the Guadalupe River...including Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River near Bloomington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, major flooding occurs. Flow downstream near Highway 35 is several hundred yards wide, cutting off many of the lowest homes. Livestock are cut off and could drown. Pumps, tank batteries, and any equipment in the flood plain below Victoria are flooded. The campground near Tivoli below Highway 35 and residences just above Highway 35 are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 26.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest around 26.9 feet by Monday morning, with little or no change through Tuesday. A slow fall may begin by Wednesday, but the river will remain in moderate flood stage through Friday. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Guadalupe River Bloomington 20.0 26.1 Sun 8 pm 26.9 26.9 26.7 25.5 24.4 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
